content:
I've created a Google Doc https://bit.ly/2ELlGhy and opened up the Zoom room for sprinting. Zoom room is optional for those interested. Feel free to drop in to ask questions or say "hi."

2020/08/29 Backdrop Sprint
Shared notes for SPRINT on 08/29/2020 Zoom: http://bit.ly/backdrop-meetings Backdrop CMS Project Progress Report (update from @quicksketch) Items: 1.16.3 Update.php throws error about install.php (and says to delete live config) #3846 Status: @todo Site stuck in maintenance mode #3956...
It's just me in Zoom right now. Some folks were talking about joining in an hour or so. This is all very casual.
good morning! (afternoon where you are)
I'll hop in the zoom room in 30, just assiging stuff to myself for now...
No rush. It's just me doing administrative work.
I'm around as well :wave:
:wave:
My intention with the Google Doc is to be a helpful tool for beginners. Feel free to modify it however you see fit (or ignore it).
image.png
...that's how it starts ^^ ...by the end of the day, it'll be like this:
image.png
Could someone jump into the Zoom room and hold it open. I have to leave for 20ish minutes and I just want to keep it open in case anyone new shows up. right now it's just me.
Doing ...
joining now!
having a coffee. might need two.
wheres the zoom room?
http://bit.ly/backdrop-meetings
If you join the Zoom room, please say "hello" so that we know that you are here. Sorry we missed you @Steve Moorhouse
Sometimes we get a bit focused and don't notice if someone new drops in.

In the Design/UX meeting we discussed what was needed to move the "Supplemental Style Sheets for Basis" issue further. Right now, we think it needs a core committer to weigh in on this. It will need a little work, but it doesn't make much sense to invest more time until we hear from a core committer.

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4512

Create option to add a supplemental stylesheet to Basis - to safely make css updates Â· Issue #4512 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need We are discussing the best way to add small css changes to Basis in core without breaking backward compatibility in #4167 Well, there is no consensus yet on a specific solut...
brb
Whoops. I made Gregory host earlier.
we're back :)

https://us02web.zoom.us/j/5202562001

Join our Cloud HD Video Meeting
Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is a publicly traded company headquartered in San Jose, CA.
Sorry! ...forgot about that :grimacing:

@quicksketch https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3238#pullrequestreview-477011124

Issue #706: Protect config directories with htaccess files. by BWPanda Â· Pull Request #3238 Â· backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#706
Commented by me: 4020 and 4289
@klonos is it okay if I work on the lazy loading issue?
I see it's your PR :)
thanks @Attila Vasas !

PR could use testing as soon as the sandbox appears :) https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3659 lazy loading image fields!

[SEO][WP] Support native browser-level loading=lazy attribute for img tags Â· Issue #3659 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need Native <img> lazy-loading is coming to the web! https://bit.ly/loading-attribute â€¦ <img loading=lazy> defers offscreen images until the user scrolls near them. S...

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4020

Add option for the "Recent content" block to control which content types to include. Â· Issue #4020 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug Layout block's conditon is ignored. Steps To Reproduce I created a new content type: "Events" I created a new layout, and add a block (Recent content) with a co...

this UI improvement could use a test :) https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4555

[UX] Better help text for layout path field Â· Issue #4555 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need I just spend a long time trying to figure out the correct path to create a custom layout for taxonomy terms. https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/how-do-i-configure-custom-la...

I've also revived this oldie-but-goodie that could use a review :) https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/146

[D8] Convert "Recent content" block to a View Â· Issue #146 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Followup to #40. Relevant drupal.org issue: https://drupal.org/node/2020393 The new views block should contain: All the same fields as the node module recent content block Operations links moved in...
I think we're having a bad Sandbox day.
Yes, I've noticed that some PRs lead to install.php. Did we break something with the things we merged recently?
I've seen this same thing before. I think it's pretty random. Some other sandboxes today just led to the same old Russian easel. ;-)

The Russian easel is happening to really old sandboxes (assuming the same cleanup happens as we do for our demo sandboxes) ...the install.php issue happens from time to time, but if it's happening for (all) new PRs, then we must have broken something.
...I know how to test this ...hold on.
I've seen the Russian easel on sandboxes that were created in the last week (or even today).
I can confirm that now ^^ :disappointed:

maybe https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/1906 should be back on the agenda again

Research continuous integration testing platforms besides Travis CI Â· Issue #1906 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
This is a follow-up to #1422, where we first encountered new, slower Travis CI servers. The new Travis servers are about 6 times slower than the old ones. Our test runs currently execute in about 1...
I think @BWPanda opened an issue about trying out Tugboat for this

Yeah he did: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4351

Use Tugboat.qa for PR sandboxes Â· Issue #4351 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need We are considering using Tugboat.qa for PR sandboxes for Backdrop core (since that's Tugboat's advertised feature). Proposed solution Backdrop core will have a new, ...
thats for sandboxes
we need ci
That too, yes. But @StPaulTim and I were complaining about PR sandboxes earlier.
true
With Tugboat, if it gets old the site goes offline, but as soon as you try to access it again it spins it back up (takes a few seconds, but better than error messages).

After the 1.16.3 and 1.17.0 releases are out, and once a couple of weeks pass (so to know that we don't have any critical bugs), we should focus on these 2 infrastructure tasks:

  • CI + PHPCS
  • switch PR sandboxes to tugboat.
    ...ZenCI has been making it hard to test PRs and way too many random failures way too often. These things are basically blockers to everything else.

...I've fixed the conflicts in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3930, so it's ready for review again.

Seven: Fieldset labels overflow container when collapsed Â· Issue #3930 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug The theme settings headers do not display well as seen in the basis theme. Steps To Reproduce On a fresh site, go to: /admin/appearance/settings/basis Close the TABS AND BREA...
There's so many things to review!! :grinning: ...you guys have been busy :bee: :bee: while I was taking a :zzz:
@docwilmot - Great work on admin labels for blocks. Watching for update to test/review.
Also @docwilmot ++ for the work on custom layout contexts, and for anything related to Layouts in general ...Backdrop wouldn't be what it is without all these things :praise:
docwilmot :pancakes: (Karma: 8)

Here is a quick and easy review:
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4413

[UX] Better label for "allow comment title" option Â· Issue #4413 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
We are working on a Backdrop project which intensively deals with comments, so expect lot's of comment-related issues from AltaGrade these days. Description of the need Ensure the comment title...

And here's another: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4584 (5 lines of code)

Add a [node:author:link] token Â· Issue #4584 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
This is basically the same as the following Token 7.x issues: https://www.drupal.org/project/token/issues/1176592 I'm working on D7 Submitted By module and found that there is no way to have a ...
Mine is easier than yours!
Yup, checking that now :grinning:
@StPaulTim please see my comment in the issue.
@klonos Time for me to go to bed, I'm getting lazy.
Sure.
...are we sprinting tomorrow/today again?
I believe that @jenlampton and/or @quicksketch are hoping to find some time to work tomorrow, but there is no formal time set up to sprint.
I mentioned that I'll be around most of afternoon and willing to join/start a Zoom room if anyone is interested.
Cool. ...I hope that I have time to go through all the work everyone's done today by the time you all wake up :smile:
...sweet (release sprint) dreams all :wave: :zzz:

StPaulTim said:

If you join the Zoom room, please say "hello" so that we know that you are here. Sorry we missed you Steve Moorhouse

Not a problem, just popped in for a minute... will join for longer next time :smile:

You also looked so engrossed :smile:
@jenlampton Commented 4289: Fixed "Access denied"
Done some more reviewing/testing. Thanks everyone for their time/effort :heart: ...I'll return again later, hoping to work on some of my issues/PRs.
Hey, sorry I wasn't able to be around much yesterday.
@docwilmot @klonos I can look into creating a Github Action to run tests if you think that would be a good alternative.
Action for tests and tugboat for boxes? Would that work? Not my area of knowledge at all, @quicksketch maybe?

I created an action on Display Suite that checks the coding standards automatically. https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/ds/actions I could probably adapt it to run tests although it might take a bit of work to get backdrop to install.

backdrop-contrib/ds
Contribute to backdrop-contrib/ds development by creating an account on GitHub.

@jenlampton do you think you can make time for https://github.com/jenlampton/backdrop/pull/12/files ? ...It may seem like a lot, but half of it is inline comments, to explain what's going on :smile:

...standards-compliant support for camera capture by klonos Â· Pull Request #12 Â· jenlampton/backdrop
Yet another PR against @jenlampton's ðŸ˜…
FYI - I'm here for a little while.
@klonos Sure, I'll give that a review :) also hiiiiiiiiiiii

@docwilmot @Joseph Flatt @klonos our current testing solution (ZenCI) has been super-optimized for Backdrop. It's unlikely anything else will be as fast without substantial work (comparable to what went into ZenCI). It might be better to ask @gor for some time to look into Zen and see if it needs a tuneup
If anyone has any questions about how to help with 1.17.0? Just ask.

Ugh ...the PR sandbox in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3064 is not working. Can you please restart it @jenlampton ?

Issue #4185: Restore access to iOS cameras for image fields. by jenlampton Â· Pull Request #3064 Â· backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#4300
yes.

Also, i fixed up https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2450 if anyone wants displays back in their admin bar :)

Add back admin bar links to manage display sub-pages Â· Issue #2450 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
While working on #315 we removed the menu router items for the sub-tabs on manage displays. This also effectively removed them from the admin bar. We should add them back or there will be a little ...

is this an improvement? https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4586 (scratching my own itch...)

[UX] Admin bar: Move "Add new X" to the bottom of each fly-out menu Â· Issue #4586 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Most of the time when I am using my admin bar, it's to manage the things I already have. Adding new things is something that only happens at the beginning of a project, and honestly I almost al...

@klonos I requested a new sandbox on https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3064?ofnffv

Speaking of itches, I filed a new PR for https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3607 :)

I noticed that the tab on the Layouts page is labeled Install new Layouts when it should really be Install new Layout TEMPLATES as per our new disambiguation between Layouts and Layout templates. P...

@bwpanda are you around today? If not, would it be okay for someone else to update your PR at https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3238#pullrequestreview-477011124 ?

Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#706
@jenlampton Just woke up, so will be a while before I can do anything, and then I'm working today anyway. So maybe best someone else takes over to finish this by code freeze...?

If you are up for a trade @bwpanda I need some help with failing tests on https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3594 :) (trade optional)

Description of the need The functionality of Imagecache Token could be merged into the existing token functionality. (It looks like this functionality is merged into token in D8.) This module provi...
I'm not too good with tests I'm afraid. I don't have much time this morning, so was just going to merge some RTBC issues. Might have more time later today, but no promises...

@BWPanda ok, no problem. those changes were easier than I expected, so not a fair trade anyway =P https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3279

706 htaccess by jenlampton Â· Pull Request #3279 Â· backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#706 Replaces #3238

@jenlampton I'll need to test multiple devices with Browserstack for #4185 so I'll need to file a separate PR (and possibly commit things multiple times until I get things to work as expected). Is that OK with you?

Uploading images via the phone camera is broken on iOS Â· Issue #4185 Â· backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the bug Back in version 1.4 we added the ability to select an image from a mobile device's camera. Sometime since then, we lost it. We should find out how that happened and add i...

long busy day for me, sorry not very productive this weekend. I could work on this feature request https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3267 but I suspect it may not make it in in time. Is there anything else that needs more urgent eyes?

Issue #4558: Allow all blocks to have an admin label by docwilmot Â· Pull Request #3267 Â· backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#4558
@docwilmot it was that one + the custom contexts one AFAIK.
Are we done yet?
@StPaulTim sounds like a kid in the back seat of a long road trip :smiling_face:
This admin label thing was supposed to have been an easy fix. :angry:
@klonos this is working now. One problem: to make a block reusable you have to give it a machine name. Can't figure out how to disable a machine name field based on a check box
Thanks @docwilmot ...I'm working ATM, but will take a look soon as I get the chance.

docwilmot said:

klonos this is working now. One problem: to make a block reusable you have to give it a machine name. Can't figure out how to disable a machine name field based on a check box

That shouldn't be a problem - default it to the admin label or title ...

IDK if anyone is still using this channel but I'm working on 1.17 issues. I'm tempted to revert https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4425 until we can get all the issues sorted out, but if anyone has strong feelings about keeping it we can work on other solutions.

Description of the need The "Date format for log messages" field at /admin/config/development/logging requires entry of PHP codes, but we have existing date/time formats at /admin/config/...
